Package dev.gamekit.core

Class Component

java.lang.Object
dev.gamekit.core.Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
RigidBody, Transform
public abstract class Component extends Object
While an Entity can have all functionality written entirely in its own class, it's usually a good idea to separate independent functionality from each other, and this is where components come in.

Component represents predefined behaviours that can then be attached to one or more entities. These behaviors include, but are not limited to, physics, lighting and network components.
